SEARCH
Package prestamo

Class PrestamoService

java.lang.Object
prestamo.PrestamoService
public class PrestamoService extends Object
Service class for managing loans (prestamos). Provides methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting loans.

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes a new instance of PrestamoService.

  • Constructor Details

    • PrestamoService

      public PrestamoService(LibroService libroService, UsuarioService usuarioService) throws ServiceException
      Initializes a new instance of PrestamoService. Loads all loans from the data source into memory.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if there is an error while reading loans from the data source

  • Method Details

    • createPrestamo

      public void createPrestamo(int usuarioId, int libroId) throws ServiceException
      Creates a new loan with the specified end date, user ID, and book ID. The start date is set to the current date.
      Parameters:
      usuarioId - the ID of the user borrowing the book
      libroId - the ID of the book being borrowed
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the end date is before the start date or if the book is already loaned

    • readPrestamo

      public DTOPrestamo readPrestamo(Integer id) throws ServiceException
      Reads a loan by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to be read
      Returns:
      the loan DTO
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the loan does not exist

    • updatePrestamo

      public void updatePrestamo(Integer id, Date fechaFin, int usuarioId, int libroId) throws ServiceException
      Updates an existing loan.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to be updated
      fechaFin - the new end date for the loan
      usuarioId - the ID of the user borrowing the book
      libroId - the ID of the book being borrowed
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the loan does not exist or if the new end date is invalid

    • deletePrestamo

      public void deletePrestamo(Integer id) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a loan by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to be deleted
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the loan does not exist

    • findPrestamoById

      public DTOPrestamo findPrestamoById(Integer id) throws ServiceException
      Finds a loan by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to be found
      Returns:
      the loan DTO
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the loan is not found

    • findPrestamosByUsuarioId

      public List<DTOPrestamo> findPrestamosByUsuarioId(Integer usuarioId) throws ServiceException
      Finds all loans by the user id.
      Parameters:
      usuarioId - the user id
      Returns:
      a list of all loan DTOs with this user id
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if no loans are found for the given user id

    • findPrestamosByLibroId

      public List<DTOPrestamo> findPrestamosByLibroId(Integer libroId) throws ServiceException
      Finds all loans by the book id.
      Parameters:
      libroId - the book id
      Returns:
      a list of all loan DTOs with this book id
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if no loans are found for the given book id
